column4: Hey, I'm using Kubuntu and basically networking isn't started until I log into KDE and KNetworkManager connects, so if I go into a different XSession or virtual terminal it won't connect to the network
Is there any program I can get, or settings I can set to have network-manager auto-connect at boot?
you can launch knetworkmanager within your other session
Not if my other session is just the console, or Virtualbox :P
